#labels model,api,class

Updates all attributes for the rows that match the `where` argument.
Attribute name and values can be passed in either using named arguments or as a struct to the `attributes` argument.

*Method Type*
This is a class level method.

*Returns*
Returns the number of records updated.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| where || yes || numeric || || SQL to use in the `WHERE` clause ||
|| attributes || yes, if no named arguments are present || struct || || attribute name/value pairs ||
|| instantiate || no || boolean || false || `true` will instantiate all objects and call their `update` methods, `false` will update using a query ||
|| named argument(s) || yes, if no `attributes` argument is present || || || attribute value (the argument name should match the name of the attribute) ||

See the section on UpdatingExistingRows for more information and code examples.
